topic.title: failover-servers()

row.entry: list of IP addresses and fully-qualified domain names

topic.para: Description: Available only in &product; version 3.2 and later. Specifies a secondary destination server where log messages are sent if the primary server becomes unaccessible. To list several failover servers, separate the address of the servers with comma. The time &abbrev; waits for the a server before switching to the next failover server is set in the time-reopen() option. For details about how client-side failover works, see .

warning.para: The failover servers must be accessible on the same port as the primary server.

note.para: This option is not available for the connection-less UDP protocol, because in this case the client does not detect that the destination becomes unaccessible.
